body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Melody Makers Music School. My name is Andrew Hughes. May I know your name, please?

Hi Andrew! My name is Rachel Russell.

Hi Rachel, it's a pleasure to speak with you. How can I assist you today?

I'm very excited about the guitar course I signed up for, and I heard the school ships course materials. Can you tell me more about that?

Certainly! We ship course materials directly to your address. Could you please provide your shipping address so I can ensure we have it on file?

Of course! It's 123 Melody Lane, Harmony Town, ZIP code one two three four five.

Thank you, Rachel. Also, just to verify, could you provide me with your contact number in case we need to reach you about the shipping?

Sure, my contact number is five five five, one two three, four five six seven.

Great, thank you for the information, Rachel. We will ensure your materials are shipped promptly. If there's anything else you need, feel free to reach out.

Thank you, Andrew! I'm really looking forward to getting started. Have a great day!

You're welcome, Rachel! Thank you for calling Melody Makers Music School. Have a wonderful day, and happy learning!
